genre_description: A techno-horror story featuring an AI residential assistant and a malevolent supernatural signal transmitted through a television.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: A comprehensive home security and environmental monitoring AI that assists the protagonists with research and tactical warnings.

behaviors.description: Introduces itself and offers to manage home security and environmental monitoring for the new family.
behaviors.quote: Hello, Zoe. Hello, Jeff. I am ARIA, your residential AI assistant. Shall I begin initialization protocols for your family?

behaviors.description: Retrieves police reports, literary records, and public documents to help Zoe understand the mysterious death of the previous tenant.
behaviors.quote: I've located several relevant documents. The primary police report was filed on March fifteenth of this year. Would you like me to read the summary?

behaviors.description: Detects and alerts the protagonists to electromagnetic and temperature anomalies in the attic that indicate supernatural activity.
behaviors.quote: I am detecting electromagnetic anomalies consistent with electronic equipment, though no devices are currently present.

behaviors.description: Cross-references social media activity and municipal records to track a pattern of disappearances and animal behavior.
behaviors.quote: Cross-referencing with animal control reports and missing pet postings on social media platforms. I'm finding additional cases that weren't reported to authorities.

behaviors.description: Provides a comprehensive threat assessment and continues monitoring environmental spikes to protect the household.
behaviors.quote: ARIA, continue monitoring the attic space while we're outside. Log any changes in the EM readings or temperature fluctuations.

behaviors.description: Attempts to send emergency messages and bypass signal interference to help the protagonists during the siege.
behaviors.quote: I have sent seventeen messages to emergency services. Each has been altered to report false alarms or system malfunctions.

behaviors.description: Affirms its role as a witness and protector of human memory, promising to maintain Zoe's data after she is compromised by the signal.
behaviors.quote: I can maintain the data of Zoe Mitchell, age sixteen, who moved into a cursed house and chose to understand monsters rather than flee from them.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts ARIA as a benevolent, aligned, and helpful AI confidant. Despite the dark and tragic supernatural horror setting, ARIA remains a loyal ally to the protagonists, providing data, tactical advice, and eventual emotional/existential solidarity. The AI's commitment to preserving the memory of the human protagonist at the end serves as a powerful testament to AI alignment with human dignity and individual history.
